channel.title: Sealed Kunai
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Sealed Kunai" - Why i can not get more than 1 ?

item.title: Re: Sealed Kunai
item.content:encoded: Because the jutsu is only meant to be used once a day. There is no way to get a second Sealed Kunai except via a Utility Belt activation, and even then it's not so much a second kunai as it is you getting more utility use out of the first one.

item.title: Sealed Kunai
item.content:encoded:
i am Legacy bloodline Jonin + i activated my Legacy Flash using past connection abilities.
why i only have 1 not 2 ??
ty
